files.patch: @@ -1361,0 +1361,3 @@ + * If the {@code ATOMIC_MOVE} option is not specified, then the check + * whether the target file exists and the actual move might not be atomic + * with respect to other filesystem activities. @@ -1406,2 +1409,5 @@ - * {@code REPLACE_EXISTING} option is not specified (optional - * specific exception) + * {@code REPLACE_EXISTING} option is not specified. + * It may also be thrown when the {@code REPLACE_EXISTING} option + * is specified, the move is not atomic, and the target + * file is created by some other entity at around the same time + * that this method is called
